student_data.notes: Student counts reflect the highest estimates found. Claude estimated 870 undergrads and 180 grads based on 2025 Engineering College enrollment ratios. OpenAI found specific official census data for Fall 2024 (IHL Fact Book) showing 569 undergrads and 173 grads in CIP code 11 (Computer/Info Sciences), but could not distinguish PhDs. Gemini estimated 798 undergrads based on ABET data.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Scout cluster has 8 nodes with 1 Nvidia K20 GPU each

gpu_resources.notes: High GPU counts aggregated from multiple cluster reports. H100 count (160) derived from Claude's report of 20 DGX systems (likely DGX A100 upgraded to H100 or new SuperPOD). A100 count (138) comes from OpenAI's sum of Atlas (40), Ptolemy (66), and Morrill (32 estimated) clusters. Gemini identified 'Hercules' with 120 A100s, which may overlap with Ptolemy/Morrill, but the higher aggregate of 138 is used. V100 count (32) includes Atlas nodes and DGX-2 systems identified by Gemini. L40S count (48) identified in Atlas cluster by OpenAI.

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini models. Significant disparity in GPU identification: Claude classified the SuperPOD as H100-based, while other models focused on A100 clusters (Ptolemy, Hercules, Atlas). Student data mixes official 2024 census data with 2025 estimates.
validation_notes: No changes made. All GPU resources appear to be locally owned and operated by Mississippi State University. Student data is present and does not require estimation.
